page.title: 05SPORTS
page.content: There is quite a lot of sporting activity in the area,the most popular sports being cricket,stoolball,angling and cycling.There are cricket clubs in Staplefield and Warninglid and there used to be one in Slaugham. The Staplefield club has been going for 105 years.It is based on the village common where there is a pavilion which sells teas during the popular Sunday friendly matches.A lot of the players live outside the area. In Warninglid there is an active ladies stoolball club.The team plays in the Sussex Stoolball Association League.They play twice a week and practice at weekends.Anglers use the ponds at Slaugham. Football is played in the area and there is a youth team.A cycling club meets every Monday evening at the village hall.
